date_must_be_valid: Invalid date format. Use YYYY-MM-DD format
target_tracer_not_found: Data for target tracer '{symbol}' not found
reversal_bullish_crossover: Golden Cross detected - potential bullish reversal
reversal_bearish_crossover: Death Cross detected - potential bearish reversal
ma_cross_bullish: Golden Cross detected (MA{short} crossing above MA{long}) - bullish signal
ma_cross_bearish: Death Cross detected (MA{short} crossing below MA{long}) - bearish signal
rsi_overbought: RSI shows overbought condition ({value}), potential downward correction
rsi_oversold: RSI shows oversold condition ({value}), potential upward rebound
bollinger_upper: Price approaching upper Bollinger Band, potential overbought
bollinger_lower: Price approaching lower Bollinger Band, potential oversold
bollinger_middle: Price within normal Bollinger Band range
fund_insight_strong_gain_7d: Significant gain of {pct}% in the last 7 days
fund_insight_strong_loss_7d: Significant loss of {pct}% in the last 7 days
fund_insight_above_avg: Current price is above the 30-day average
fund_insight_below_avg: Current price is below the 30-day average
comparison_better: {symbol} shows better performance compared to IDR
comparison_worse: {symbol} shows worse performance compared to IDR
llm_analysis_unavailable: AI analysis not available at this time
method_fundamental_desc: Analysis based on historical price movements, averages, and trend consistency to assess asset fundamental strength.
method_price_momentum_desc: Measures price changes over 1-day, 7-day, and 30-day periods to identify direction and strength of movement.
method_avg_comparison_desc: Compares current price with 7 and 30-day averages to determine relative price position.
method_trend_consistency_desc: Counts up vs down days in the last 14 days to measure trend consistency.
method_technical_desc: Analysis using industry-standard technical indicators to identify trading opportunities and key levels.
method_rsi_desc: Measures speed and change of price movements. RSI > 70 = overbought, RSI < 30 = oversold.
method_macd_desc: Shows relationship between two moving averages to identify momentum and trend direction.
method_bollinger_desc: Uses standard deviation to determine overbought/oversold levels and market volatility.
method_ma_desc: Simple and Exponential Moving Averages for identifying trends and dynamic support/resistance levels.
method_support_resistance_desc: Identifies key price levels where price tends to reverse or stall.
explanation_situation_bullish_strong: The market is currently in a strong bullish condition. Uptrend is consistent across multiple timeframes with solid momentum.
explanation_situation_bullish_moderate: The market shows moderate bullish trend. Positive indications present but needs further confirmation.
explanation_situation_bullish_weak: Weak bullish indication detected. Positive trend exists but not particularly strong.
explanation_situation_bearish_strong: The market is in a strong bearish condition. Consistent downtrend with significant selling pressure.
explanation_situation_bearish_moderate: The market shows moderate bearish trend. Selling pressure present but not extreme.
explanation_situation_bearish_weak: Weak bearish indication detected. Light selling pressure but market remains relatively stable.
explanation_situation_sideways_strong: Market is in tight consolidation phase.
explanation_situation_sideways_moderate: Market moving sideways without clear direction.
explanation_situation_sideways_weak: Market in uncertain condition, waiting for catalyst to determine direction.
explanation_technical_summary: From a technical perspective, RSI shows {rsi} condition, MACD is {macd}, with volatility at {volatility}%.
explanation_fundamental_summary: Fundamentally, condition is {strength} with 7-day change of {pct_7d}% and 30-day change of {pct_30d}%.
explanation_outlook_bullish: Market outlook leans positive. Upward momentum maintained with supportive indicators.
explanation_outlook_bearish: Market outlook leans negative. Selling pressure remains dominant, caution advised.
explanation_outlook_sideways: Market outlook is neutral. Recommended to wait for clearer directional confirmation.
explanation_risk_high: âš ï¸ WARNING: High volatility indicates greater risk. Use strict risk management.
explanation_risk_medium: ðŸ“Š Medium volatility. Make sure to set reasonable stop losses.
explanation_risk_low: âœ… Low volatility indicates relatively stable market conditions.
rec_bullish_trend_buy: Bullish trend confirmed with buy signal. Opportunity to enter long position.
rec_bullish_trend_hold: Bullish trend but signal not yet confirmed. Hold existing position or wait for pullback.
rec_bearish_trend_sell: Bearish trend with sell signal. Consider taking profit or exiting position.
rec_bearish_trend_caution: Bearish trend. Be cautious with long positions, consider reducing exposure.
rec_sideways_trend: Sideways market. Avoid large positions, wait for clear breakout.
rec_rsi_overbought: RSI overbought - avoid buying at current price, wait for correction.
rec_rsi_oversold: RSI oversold - potential accumulation area for entry point.
rec_high_volatility: High volatility - use smaller position sizing.
rec_bullish_reversal: Bullish reversal signal detected - watch for confirmation to enter.
rec_bearish_reversal: Bearish reversal signal detected - consider securing profits.
action_consider_buy: Consider opening buy position with clear stop loss
action_wait_confirmation: Wait for signal confirmation before taking action
action_consider_sell: Consider closing position or taking profit
action_reduce_exposure: Reduce exposure and tighten stop losses
action_wait_breakout: Wait for breakout from current range before entry
action_avoid_buying: Avoid buying, wait for pullback or correction
action_look_for_entry: Look for entry opportunity at oversold levels
action_use_stop_loss: Must use stop loss, more conservative position sizing
primary_action_strong_buy: PRIMARY ACTION: Buy with high confidence. All indicators support bullish position.
primary_action_buy: PRIMARY ACTION: Consider buying with proper risk management.
primary_action_hold: PRIMARY ACTION: Hold current position. Market has not given clear signal.
primary_action_sell: PRIMARY ACTION: Consider selling or taking profit.
primary_action_strong_sell: PRIMARY ACTION: Sell or exit position. Strong bearish signal.
stop_loss_suggestion: Suggested stop loss: {pct}% from entry price
position_sizing_high: Position sizing: Normal (1-2% risk per trade)
position_sizing_medium: Position sizing: Moderate (0.5-1% risk per trade)
position_sizing_low: Position sizing: Conservative (0.25-0.5% risk per trade)
